mapper.select: select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, A.* from (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) B ,(SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY ${filter.quary_name} ${filter.order}) A where product_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') limit #{paging.limit} offset #{paging.offset};
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{product_name}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_desc = #{product_desc}, product_img = #{product_img}, product_category = #{product_category}, product_quantity = #{product_quantity} WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, product_price, product_desc, product_img, product_category, product_quantity) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_desc}, #{product_img}, #{product_category}, #{product_quantity})
